channel.title: Please Help ME!
channel.description:
Base: 317 Pi
The title says it all, I want to add an npc area that is muti combat so players can kill npcs together. I looked on my npchandler file. I wanted to add it but when I do Im not putting in the right place. Can someone help me or tell me the correct area that I need to add it in the file?
I looked and looked and tryed to add and ether get 100 errors or 3 errors:
[code]src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:4135: error: class, interface, or enum exp ected public boolean inMulti() { ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:4164: error: class, interface, or enum exp ected } ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:4166: error: class, interface, or enum exp ected } ^ 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Please Help ME!
item.dc:creator: @InfectedWhore InfectedWhore
item.description:
@InfectedWhore wrote:

If you still are yet to fix this, first of; make sure your ‘public boolean inMulti’ is in Player.Java, not NPCHandler.java.

Make sure you have got the correct co-ordinates for the boolean, E.G. Lowest X > Highest X > Lowest Y > Highest Y.

If this doesn’t help, or you need something else, just PM me.

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help ME!
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

If u easy want to code a multi area for npc’s.
you can use castlewars area for the npc’s.
the coords are 2404 - 3082 .
and delete the code that u was adding

Read full topic
